WorkItem.Description:
Use the demo showing on the home page for an example: http://www.tetracon.de/charts/:

Step to reproduce:
1. Select any pie-piece from the Pie chart on ALL tab.
2. Select another tab (Bar, for example).
3. Go back to the All tab.

Issue/Result: 
The pie-piece which get selected before is not showing as selected, and you can not select it again (won't changed to Orange.)
